author: GameSpot
description:
Lucy James played 17 hours of Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 in 2 days... and now she's here to tell us everything we need to know about the outstanding new game. She takes us through the basics of the story, the turn-based combat, and how much she loves the game's music.

0:00 - Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 First Impressions
0:42 - Explaining The Basic Story Setup
2:28 - Combat In Clair Obscur: Expedition 33
6:20 - A Very French Game
8:15 - The Music In Clair Obscur: Expedition 33

#clairobscur #expedition33 #clairobscurexpedition33 #rpg #jrpg #gamespot
title: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33's Combat Is EXCELLENT

author: GameSpot
description:
Tamoor Hussain sat down with Swen Vinke from Larian to discuss the studio's future plans.

22:11 Will AI usage help development timelines?

26:21 How do you manage risk as the studio gets bigger?
27:38 What are the mistakes studios make implementing current trends?

33:44 What can you tell other developers about making single player games?

title: Larian Studios Talks About Its Future
